Description:
Detects persistence via Visual Studio Tools for Office (VSTO) add-ins in Office applications.

Author: Bhabesh Raj
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Potential Persistence Via Visual Studio Tools for Office
Query: sourcetype like 'windows-%' eql select * from _source_ where ((target_object like '%\software\microsoft\office\outlook\addins\%' or target_object like '%\software\microsoft\office\word\addins\%' or target_object like '%\software\microsoft\office\excel\addins\%' or target_object like '%\software\microsoft\office\powerpoint\addins\%' or target_object like '%\software\microsoft\vsto\security\inclusion\%') and  not (process_path like '%\teams.exe' or (process_path = 'c:\program files\avg\antivirus\regsvr.exe' and target_object like '%\microsoft\office\outlook\addins\antivirus.asoutext\%') or (process_path like '%\msiexec.exe' or process_path like '%\regsvr32.exe') or (process_path like '%\excel.exe' or process_path like '%\integrator.exe' or process_path like '%\officeclicktorun.exe' or process_path like '%\winword.exe' or process_path like '%\visio.exe')))
